column2: exactly what I've been looking for in breakfast spots!  Showed up at 9:30 on Sunday morning and there was already a decent-sized line outside.  Luckily
column3: I had done my research and knew to go straight to the clipboard and told my boyfriend to grab some coffee.  We're not picky
column4: so we didn't have to wait at all since we took the bar on the patio
column5: it's really not that awkward because your view is more of the street rather than the people in front of you at their table.
